name: Customer information
query:
select
cus.name as "Name:Link/Customer:100",
(select count(*) from `tabCustomer Agreement` where customer = cus.name and agreement_status ="Open") as "Number of active agreements::190",
cus.reason_why_agreement_was_not_signed as "Reason why agreement was not signed::190",
(select name from `tabAddress` where customer=cus.name limit 1) as "Address No 1::100",
(select name from `tabAddress` where customer=cus.name limit 1,1) as "Address No 2::100",
cus.company_email_id_1 as "Customer email No1::130",
cus.company_email_id_2 as "Customer email No2::130",
cus.company_phone_1 as "Telephone number No1::160",
cus.company_phone_2 as "Telephone number No2::160",
cus.best_time_for_contact as "Best time for contact::130",
cus.customer_is_interested_in as "Customer is interested in::150",
cus.birthdate as "Birthday::70",
cus.age as "Age::50",
cus.gender as "Gender::70",
cus.newsletter_subcribed as "Newsletter::100",
cus.found_out_about_be_kredito as "Found out Be Kredito::150",
cus.customer_lives_in_rented_apartment as "Customer lives in rented apartment::200",
cus.work_place as "Working place::100",
cus.position as "Position::100",
cus.duration_of_employment as "Duration of employment::140",
cus.salary as "Salary::80",
cus.nearest_salary_payment_day as "Nearest salary payment day::140",
cus.married_or_lives_with_partner as "Married, lives with partner::170",
cus.spouse_first_name as "Spouse first name::140",
cus.spouse_last_name as "Spouse last name::140",
cus.spouse_contact_no as "Spouse Contact no::140",
cus.spouse_email_id as "Spouse E-mail::170",
cus.spouse_working_place as "Spouse Working place::140",
cus.spouse_salary as "Spouse Salary::100",
cus.no_of_children as "Number of children::150"


from `tabCustomer` cus
